content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I am open to negotiate the rental price with you. However, I do have certain expectations for the price. What price range are you willing to pay for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Bo Li. While I appreciate your interest, I am not willing to accept this price. I believe that the apartment is worth more than 550 Euros per month. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.

I want to be clear that I am a responsible and dependable student, and I would like to maintain a good relationship with my landlord. I am very interested in this apartment and I believe that it is a good fit for me.

I understand that you may have certain expectations for the rental price, and I am open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that you may have.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your revised offer, Bo Li. While I appreciate your interest, I am still not willing to accept this price. I believe that the apartment is worth more than 600 Euros per month. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I am unable to agree to this price at this time.

If you are interested in the apartment, I would be happy to discuss any additional terms or conditions that you may have. Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
